newsitem.title: USA: Western Digital at ease with high estimates.
newsitem.headline: Western Digital at ease with high estimates.

text.p: Western Digital Corp Chief Financial Officer Duston Williams said Friday the company was comfortable with the upper end of the range of analysts' earnings estimates for the third quarter ending March 31.
He said estimates ranged from $1.35 to $1.40 per share.
"We are very comfortable with the upper or high end of the range," he said. He made the comments at the Goldman Sachs Technology Investment Conference in New York.
The First Call consensus estimate is $1.38 per share.
In the year-ago third quarter the company reported earnings of $0.42 a share.
